sections.TOP:
Wolfsbane02119063ml9o42n5kqss035c270kg912qgbzy1499142014-06-29T19:40:58ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603{{Quote|Wolfsbane. A rare substance. This is no common assassin.|[[Tywin Lannister]]|A Man Without Honor}}

'''Wolfsbane''' is a lethal [[poison]] obtained from a plant of the same name. Darts dipped in it may kill a grown man quickly.
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels wolfsbane is mentioned as a type of poison but is never employed in the narrative. Jaqen H'ghar's second victim, Weese, is seemingly killed when his dog tears out his throat.

Wolfsbane is actually a poison in real-life, made from the ''Aconitum'' plant genus, which contains 250 individual species - all collectively known as "wolf's bane".
sections.History:
===Season 2===
[[Jaqen H'ghar]] murders Ser [[Amory Lorch]] using a poisonous dart dipped in wolfsbane. Tywin Lannister identifies the poison from the smell of the dart.
